headline: Is Best Buy’s Recent 13% Rally a Signal for Investors in 2025?
summary: If you’re wondering what to do with your Best Buy shares right now, you’re not alone. Investors have had plenty to think about, especially with the stock’s recent ups and downs. After a bit of a lull to start the year, Best Buy’s share price has come alive, climbing 5.0% just in the last week and gaining 12.9% over the past month. Even so, if you zoom out further, the stock is still down 7.9% over the last year and about 4.3% so far in 2024. That mix of short-term momentum and lingering...
